title: Frontend Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 GoQuant is a forward\\-thinking technology company dedicated to developing innovative solutions that empower digital asset traders and researchers. Our mission is to provide cutting\\-edge tools and platforms that enhance profitability, streamline workflows, and deliver real\\-time data insights. We specialize in creating high\\-performance products such as GoMarket, a subscription\\-based service offering low\\-latency digital asset data, and GoTrade, a comprehensive trading platform designed for professional traders and institutions. Our technology stack leverages advanced programming languages including C\\+\\+, Python, and modern front\\-end frameworks like NextJS to ensure robust, scalable, and user\\-friendly solutions.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a skilled and motivated Front\\-End Software Engineer with expertise in Python and JavaScript to join our core development team. This is a full\\-time position that offers an exciting opportunity to contribute to the development of sophisticated data visualization tools, trading interfaces, and real\\-time financial dashboards. As part of our team, you will work closely with project managers and full\\-stack developers to design, implement, and optimize user\\-facing applications within a fast\\-paced fintech environment. Remote applicants are encouraged to apply, reflecting our flexible work culture.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate should possess strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Python, with hands\\-on experience in modern front\\-end frameworks such as React and NextJS. Familiarity with UI/UX design tools like Figma or Adobe XD is essential for translating designs into functional interfaces. Candidates should have experience working with databases such as MySQL or MongoDB and be capable of building responsive and accessible user interfaces. Knowledge of cloud platforms like AWS or Azure is a plus, as is the ability to thrive in a dynamic, results\\-oriented environment. Excellent communication skills, problem\\-solving abilities, and teamwork are critical. A bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience, is required.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 Develop and maintain front\\-end components for trading tools, dashboards, and analytics platforms to ensure seamless user experiences.
   

  

 Collaborate with engineering leadership and full\\-stack developers to define and implement new features, enhancements, and product directions.
   

  

 Translate UI/UX designs from tools like Figma and Adobe XD into responsive, production\\-ready code that performs reliably across devices and browsers.
   

  

 Provide feedback on product architecture, usability, and overall user experience to continuously improve the platform.
   

  

 Build intuitive data visualization interfaces that integrate with real\\-time backend systems, ensuring timely and accurate data presentation.
   

  

 Participate in debugging, performance tuning, and UI improvements to optimize application responsiveness and stability.
   

  

 Support ongoing updates and maintenance of GoQuantâ€™s websites and client\\-facing platforms, ensuring high availability and security standards.
   

  

**Benefits**
 Competitive salary packages complemented by comprehensive benefits to support your well\\-being and professional growth.
   

  

 Flexible remote work options to promote work\\-life balance and accommodate diverse lifestyles.
   

  

 Opportunity to take ownership of impactful projects, directly influencing product development and user satisfaction.
   

  

 Work within a collaborative, high\\-performance team environment that fosters innovation and continuous learning.
   

  

 Exposure to the latest fintech tools, technologies, and workflows, providing valuable industry experience.
   

  

 Potential equity participation in a rapidly expanding startup, offering long\\-term financial growth opportunities.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

* GoQuant is committed to fostering an inclusive and diverse work environment. We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer and do not discriminate based on race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, veteran status, or any other protected characteristic. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to these factors.

title: Software Engineer
description:
**About The Company**
 HCLTech is a global technology leader renowned for its innovative solutions and commitment to excellence. With a rich history spanning several decades, HCLTech specializes in IT services, enterprise transformation, and digital solutions across diverse industries. The company prides itself on fostering a collaborative and inclusive work environment, empowering its employees to deliver impactful results for clients worldwide. As a forward\\-thinking organization, HCLTech continuously invests in cutting\\-edge technologies and talent development to stay at the forefront of the industry.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a skilled Cloud Database Administrator (DBA) to join our dynamic team at HCLTech. In this role, you will be responsible for maintaining the health, performance, and security of our cloud\\-based and on\\-premises databases. Your expertise will ensure the seamless operation of critical data systems, supporting our clients' digital transformation initiatives. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in RDBMS concepts, Oracle database management, and cloud environments, with optional experience in AWS services. This position offers an exciting opportunity to work with cutting\\-edge technologies and contribute to large\\-scale enterprise solutions.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate should possess a minimum of 6 months to 3 years of relevant experience in database administration, with a solid understanding of relational database management systems. Educational qualifications include a minimum of 60% marks in 10th, 12th, and degree programs. Candidates from the 2023 and 2024 academic batches are preferred. Technical proficiency in Oracle, Data Guard, RMAN, SQL, and PL/SQL is essential. Additional experience in AWS cloud services such as RDS, Lambda, CloudFormation, and Service Catalog is desirable but optional. Candidates should also have basic scripting skills in Unix shell or Python and a good understanding of database security and compliance standards.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Proactively monitor and maintain the overall health and performance of all databases, ensuring high availability and reliability.
* Manage Oracle databases, including configuration, patching, upgrades, and applying security patches to safeguard data integrity.
* Implement and oversee backup strategies using RMAN, monitor backup processes, and coordinate with the backup team to ensure data safety.
* Administer user access, manage database space, and optimize storage at both database and server levels.
* Monitor Oracle physical standby databases and replicas, perform rebuilds or re\\-sync operations as necessary to maintain replication integrity.
* Coordinate code deployments related to database schemas, stored procedures, and configurations to ensure minimal downtime.
* Assist in managing cloud\\-based databases, particularly in AWS environments, including RDS management and security enhancements.
* Perform routine health checks, troubleshoot issues related to long\\-running queries, and recommend performance improvements.
* Develop and maintain scripts in Unix shell or Python to automate routine tasks and improve operational efficiency.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to implement security best practices and ensure compliance with organizational standards.


**Benefits**
 HCLTech offers a comprehensive benefits package designed to support our employees' health, well\\-being, and professional growth. Employees are entitled to competitive salary structures, health insurance, and retirement plans. The company promotes continuous learning through training programs, certifications, and development workshops. Additionally, HCLTech provides a collaborative work environment, flexible work arrangements, and opportunities for career advancement within a global organization. We also emphasize work\\-life balance and employee wellness initiatives to foster a positive and productive workplace.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 HCLTech is an equal opportunity employer committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based on race, religion, gender, age, disability, or any other protected characteristic. We believe in fostering diversity and ensuring that every individual has the opportunity to contribute and succeed within our organization. Our hiring practices are based solely on merit, skills, and qualifications, and we are dedicated to providing a fair and equitable workplace for everyone.

title: Accolite - Quality Assurance Engineer - Manual & Automation Testing
description:
**Description**
 We are looking for a QA Engineer who will create, execute, and maintain automated testing solutions.
   

  

 You will manage all activities to ensure that all the objectives are met and that the solution works as expected.
   

  

 The solution should be tested in terms of functionality, performance, reliability, stability and compatibility with other systems.
   

  

**Role And Responsibilities**
* Review functional and design specifications to ensure full understanding of individual deliverables
* Identify test requirements from specifications, map test case requirements and design test coverage plan
* Write, document, and maintain automated testing solutions and other test artifacts like the test data, data validation, harness scripts and automated scripts
* Execute and evaluate manual or automated test cases and report test results
* Hold and facilitate test plan/case reviews with cross\\-functional team members
* Identify any potential quality issues per defined process and escalate potential quality issues immediately to management
* Ensure that validated deliverables meet functional and design specifications and requirements
* Isolate, replicate, and report defects and verify defect fixes.


**Preferred Qualifications**

* Proven experience writing automated test scripts for functional testing using Selenium (Javascript preferred)
* Experience in Load/Performance testing with JMeter

* Liaison with development, project management, and customer support

* BS or BA degree preferred.


**Nice\\-to\\-Haves**

* Appium Experience.

title: Platform Engineer - GCP Terraform DevOps - VOIS
description:
**Who We Are**
 VOIS (Vodafone Intelligent Solutions) is a strategic arm of Vodafone Group Plc, creating value for customers by delivering intelligent solutions through Talent, Technology \\& Transformation.
   

  

 As the largest shared services organisation in the global telco industry with 30,000 FTE, our portfolio of next\\-generation solutions and services are designed in partnership with customers across Vodafone Group, local markets, and partner markets to simplify and drive growth. With our strategic partner Accenture, we work alongside our Vodafone customers, other Telco and tech companies to drive transformation, meet the challenges of our industry and ensure we stay relevant and resilient. This partnership is a unique, industry\\-first model which brings together the best of in\\-house and 3rd party capability.
   

  

 We work with customers across 28 countries from 10 VOIS locations: Albania, Egypt, Hungary, India, Romania, Spain, Turkey, UK, Germany, Ireland, and with a network of teams in Czech Republic, Italy, Greece, and Portugal.
   

  

 \\#VOIS \\#BeUnrivalled \\#CreateTheFuture
   

  

**About This Role**
 We are seeking a skilled and proactive GCP Platform Engineer to design, implement, and manage scalable, secure, and reliable cloud infrastructure on Google Cloud Platform (GCP). The individual will work closely with development, security, and operations teams to enable cloud\\-native solutions, automate infrastructure, and support application migrations. This role is part of the Data \\& Analytics function within VOIS Technology (TSSW), supporting the Nucleus Portugal project. The position is based in Pune, Bangalore, or Ahmedabad and is open to permanent or contract hiring.
   

  

**What Youâ€™ll Do**
* Design and implement GCP infrastructure using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools such as Terraform
* Manage CI/CD pipelines using Cloud Build, Jenkins, or GitHub Actions
* Implement monitoring, logging, and alerting using Cloud Monitoring and Cloud Logging
* Configure and manage IAM roles, service accounts, and VPC networking
* Ensure security best practices, compliance, and cost optimisation across GCP environments
* Troubleshoot infrastructure and deployment issues and provide on\\-call support as needed
* Apply strong problem\\-solving, debugging, and analytical skills
* Use scripting languages such as Python and Bash for automation
* Support Datawarehouse and ETL concepts in cloud environments
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams and participate in Agile ceremonies


**Who You Are**
* 3â€“7 years of relevant experience in cloud infrastructure and DevOps
* Proficient in GCP components including BigQuery, Datafusion, and SQL/PLSQL
* Strong understanding of Datawarehouse concepts and ETL pipelines
* Skilled in Terraform, Python, Bash, and GCP\\-native tools
* Familiar with networking, firewalls, load balancers, and DNS in cloud environments
* Knowledge of cloud security, identity management, and cost governance
* Excellent communication skills in English (written and verbal)
* Demonstrates analytical thinking, proactive issue resolution, and team collaboration
* Holds a valid Indian passport and open to rare travel requirements
* GCP certifications such as Professional Cloud Architect or DevOps Engineer are desirable


**Not a perfect fit?**
 Concerned you may not meet every requirement? Vodafone is committed to creating an inclusive workplace where everyone can thrive. If you are excited about this role but your experience does not align exactly with every aspect of the job description, you are encouraged to apply. You may be the right candidate for this or another opportunity, and the recruitment team will support you in exploring where your skills fit best.
   

  

**What's In It For You**
* Opportunity to work on high\\-impact cloud transformation projects
* Exposure to cutting\\-edge GCP technologies and DevOps practices
* Collaborative work environment with global teams
* Flexibility to work across multiple locations and project domains
* Continuous learning and development through certifications and internal programmes


**What Skills You Will Learn**
* Advanced GCP infrastructure design and automation
* CI/CD pipeline management and optimisation
* Cloud\\-native monitoring and security practices
* Agile delivery and cross\\-functional collaboration
* Infrastructure troubleshooting and performance tuning


 VOIS Equal Opportunity Employer Commitment
   

  

 Vodafone recognises and celebrates the value of diversity in building a workforce that reflects the customers and communities it serves. No form of discrimination is tolerated. This includes, but is not limited to, discrimination based on race, colour, age, veteran status, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, pregnancy, maternity or parental status, ethnicity, disability, religion or belief, political affiliation, trade union membership, nationality, citizenship, indigenous status, medical condition, HIV status, neurodiversity, social origin, cultural background, marital or civil partnership status, or socio\\-economic background.
   

  

 Join Us
   

  

 At Vodafone, weâ€™re working hard to build a better future. A more connected, inclusive and sustainable world. As a dynamic global community, it's our human spirit, together with technology, that empowers us to achieve this.
   

  

 We challenge and innovate in order to connect people, businesses, and communities across the world. Delighting our customers and earning their loyalty drive us, and we experiment, learn fast and get it done, together.
   

  

 With us, you can be truly be yourself and belong, share inspiration, embrace new opportunities, thrive, and make a real difference.

title: C# Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 At North Point Nine, we empower businesses to unlock their full potential through AI\\-powered solutions and bespoke software development across various industries. Our dedicated team delivers tailored services in software development, algorithmic platforms, business consulting, and other specialized areas to help organizations scale efficiently and effectively. Trusted by clients worldwide, we are committed to providing market\\-leading solutions that drive measurable success and foster long\\-term growth.
   

  

 Our expertise spans multiple domains including AI\\-powered algorithms, custom software development, fintech solutions, data analytics, and BPO \\& KPO services. We work with forward\\-thinking companies across the UK, USA, Canada, and beyond, delivering innovative, high\\-impact solutions that enable our clients to stay ahead in competitive markets.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly skilled and proactive Senior C\\# Developer with expertise in DevExpress and MS SQL to join North Point Nine as a full\\-time team member. This role offers an exciting opportunity to work on cutting\\-edge PropTech systems, collaborating directly with the business team and senior management. The successful candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining our flagship platform, ensuring it meets the highest standards of quality, performance, and scalability.
   

  

 The position is hybrid, with flexible hours aligned with the UK time zone, and requires dependable availability for effective communication and collaboration. Candidates should be comfortable working both remotely and in our Mohali office, with frequent visits to the latter. This role provides a unique chance to contribute to innovative projects in a dynamic environment while working alongside a diverse, global team.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate will possess a minimum of five years of professional experience working with C\\# and DevExpress (WinForms or WPF). A proven track record of building enterprise applications using C\\# and MS SQL Server is essential, along with advanced skills in SQL query writing, schema design, and performance tuning. A relevant degree in Computer Science or a related field is required.
   

  

 Additional qualifications include good knowledge of Powershell, hands\\-on experience with DevExpress UI controls and reporting tools, and the ability to quickly adapt to and understand established codebases. Strong analytical, problem\\-solving, and communication skills are vital, as is a high level of attention to detail and a team\\-oriented mindset. Above all, honesty and integrity are fundamental values for this role.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, maintain, enhance, and support the company's flagship platform using C\\# and DevExpress within Visual Studio.
* Work extensively with Microsoft SQL Server, including writing complex T\\-SQL queries, creating stored procedures, optimizing database schemas, and improving performance.
* Write scalable, maintainable, and efficient code aligned with long\\-term development goals.
* Collaborate closely with management and internal stakeholders to understand business needs and deliver effective, timely solutions.
* Build and refine user interface components using DevExpress controls, including WinForms and WPF.
* Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize application performance to ensure high reliability and user satisfaction.
* Provide clear, well\\-documented code and regular progress updates to team members and management.


**Benefits**
* Competitive salary package aligned with experience and expertise.
* Performance\\-based bonuses and additional incentives to reward excellence and commitment.
* Hybrid working model with approximately two days per week in the Mohali office, providing flexibility and work\\-life balance.
* Opportunity to work on innovative projects utilizing the latest technologies in a collaborative environment.
* Engagement with international teams based in India, UK, and USA, fostering a global perspective.
* Participation in a company culture that emphasizes innovation, trust, and a people\\-first approach.
* Annual leave and holidays to support personal well\\-being and professional growth.


 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 North Point Nine is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based on race, ethnicity, gender, age, religion, sexual orientation, disability, or any other protected characteristic. We believe that a diverse workforce fosters innovation, creativity, and better decision\\-making, and we welcome applicants from all backgrounds to apply and join our team.

description:

title: Intermediate Application Software Quality Engineer
description:
**Before you apply to a job, select your language preference from the options available at the top right of this page.**
 Explore your next opportunity at a Fortune Global 500 organization. Envision innovative possibilities, experience our rewarding culture, and work with talented teams that help you become better every day. We know what it takes to lead UPS into tomorrowâ€”people with a unique combination of skill \\+ passion. If you have the qualities and drive to lead yourself or teams, there are roles ready to cultivate your skills and take you to the next level.
   

  

**Job Description**
 The Software Quality Engineer executes Information Services (I.S.) Quality Assurance (QA) processes with moderate guidance. He/She identifies problems, generates alternatives, and recommends solutions within defined processes. This position documents the progress of assigned tasks to ensure objectives are met. He/She collaborates effectively with QA team members, application developers, software vendors, consultants, user communities, and test environment technical support staff in the execution of testing procedures. This position supports testing efforts of small to medium complexity. The Software Quality Engineer is knowledgeable of the key processes and technology within the business functions he/she supports.
   

  

**Employee Type**
 Permanent
   

  

 UPS is committed to providing a workplace free of discrimination, harassment, and retaliation.
